stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, you may swap it with a piece of ice from HQ. If you do, gain 4 credits. (The new ice is installed unrezzed. You do not pay an install cost.) Subroutine End the run. [at]Designed by 2020 Intercontinental Champion Yannick Stucki[/at]
text: When the Runner passes this ice, you may swap it with a piece of ice from HQ. If you do, gain 4[credit]. (The new ice is installed unrezzed. You do not pay an install cost.) [subroutine] End the run. [at]Designed by 2020 Intercontinental Champion Yannick Stucki[/at]
title: Tatu-Bola
